DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Active Power peak of this day"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32078, Int32, 2) \u002B \u0022 kW\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Reactive Power"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32082, Int32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kVar\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Rated Power"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 30073, Uint32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kW\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Reactive Power Compensation (PF)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 40122, Int16)/1000"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Reactive Power Compensation (Q/S)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 40123, Int16)/1000"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Active Power Derating percent (0.1%)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 40122, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022%\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Active Power Derating (fixed value W)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 40126, Uint32, 2) \u002B \u0022 W\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Maximum Active Power"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 30075, Uint32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kW\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Maximum Apparent Power"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 30077, Uint32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kVA\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Maximum reactive power (fed to grid)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 30079, Uint32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kVar\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Maximum reactive power (absorbed from grid)"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 30081, Uint32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 kVar\u0022"}]
DeviceProperties.ServiceActionsScripts: [{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Reactive Power Compensation (PF)","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Reactive power compensation","Abbreviation":"pf","Values":[{"Item1":-1,"Item2":"-1"},{"Item1":-0.9,"Item2":"-0.9"},{"Item1":-0.8,"Item2":"-0.8"},{"Item1":0.8,"Item2":"0.8"},{"Item1":0.9,"Item2":"0.9"},{"Item1":1,"Item2":"1"}]}]},"Script":"MODBUSWNE(H, 40122, Int16, pf*1000);"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Reactive Power Compensation (Q/S)","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Reactive power compensation (-1, 1]","Abbreviation":"rpc","IsFloat":true,"MinValue":-1,"MaxValue":1}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(H, 40123, Int16, rpc*1000);"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Active Power Derating Percent(%)","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Active Power Derating Percent(%)","Abbreviation":"apdp","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":0,"MaxValue":100}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(H, 40125, Uint16, apdp*10)"}]

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"A Voltage"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32069, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"B Voltage "},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32070, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"C Voltage"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32071, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"A Current"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32072, Int32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 A\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"B Current"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32074, Int32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 A\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"C Current"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32076, Int32, 2)/1000 \u002B \u0022 A\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"AB Voltage"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32066, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"BC Voltage"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32067, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"CA Voltage"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32068, Int16)/10 \u002B \u0022 V\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Frequency"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 32085, Uint16)/100 \u002B \u0022 Hz\u0022"}]

DeviceProperties.ReadSwitchState: var reg := MODBUSR(H, 32089, Uint16); IF(reg = 0, 0, IF(reg < 4 OR reg = 40960,1, IF(reg = 256, 2, IF(reg < 515, 3, IF(reg < 775, 4, IF(reg = 1025 OR reg = 1026, 5, IF(reg = 1280 OR reg = 1281, 7, IF(reg = 1536, 8, IF(reg = 2048, 6, IF(reg = 2304, 9 ))))))))))
